title: WTB: N172 in poor and above
author: Slinger

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 in poor and above
posts.post_content:
I am looking to buy some 1887 n172 Old Judge cards.

Looking to buy already graded, or cards that I can send in to grade. I am looking for cards that will hit a PSA 1 or better. I don't like the authentic label. 

Players and poses don't matter to me, as I only have a handful so far. 

Appreciate it in advance. Happy collecting.
Bump for still looking to buy.
